uz.lex1: 2023 yilda Lexus Professional Tennis Assotsiatsiyasi (ATP) bilan ATP Tourning rasmiy avtomobil hamkori va Platinum hamkori sifatida ko'p yillik hamkorlikni imzoladi. Lexus va ATP Tour ikkalasi ham innovatsiyalar, ishlash va mukammallikka intilish haqida hikoya qiladi. Muxlislar va mijozlar doimo birinchi o'rinda turadi va ikkala brend ham unutilmas tajribalarni taqdim etishga qaratilgan.
uz.dive: O'yinchilarning qiyinchiliklarini butunlay yangi darajaga olib chiqadigan ajoyib seriyaga sho'ng'ing. YouTubega kelgan barcha epizodlar bilan har bir lahzani tomosha qiling.
uz.p1: Lexus ATP Head2Head seriyasining oltinchi epizodida ATP Tour o'yinchilari raketkalarni darvozaga almashtiradilar. Londonda ular eng ko'p ingliz sporti - kriketda o'zlarini sinab ko'rishadi. Ikkita angliyalik kriket bo'yicha mutaxassis ularni to'qnashuv va maydonga tushishning aniqligini sinovdan o'tkazdi. Kim eng ko'p gol uradi? Buni bilish uchun tomosha qiling.
uz.p2: Ikkinchi bo'limda ATP Tour o'yinchilarining so'nggi elektrlashtiruvchi axlat ovida qatnashish uchun Parijga yo'l olishlarini tomosha qiling. Ularning vazifasi: 40 daqiqalik qattiq oynada imkon qadar ko'proq narsalarni toping. Chempionlik unvoniga kim da'vogarligini bilish uchun videoni tomosha qiling.
uz.p3: ATP Tour o'yinchilari Head2Head Scavenger Huntning uchinchi qismida to'qnash kelishayotganida Turindagi bahsni tomosha qiling. Mag'lubiyatga uchragan holda, bosim yaxshi va haqiqatan ham davom etadi. Kim cho'qqiga ko'tarilganiga guvoh bo'lish uchun videoni sozlang.
uz.p4: Lexus ATP Head2Head eksklyuziv seriyasining to‘rtinchi epizodida ATP Tour o‘yinchilarimiz pazandachilik muammosiga duch kelishmoqda. 2024-yilning birinchi qismida ular Rotterdamdagi Fred restoraniga ikki Mishel yulduzli oshpaz bilan uchrashish uchun yo‘l olishadi. sirli ingredientlar savati. Lexus Cook Off Challenge tanlovida kim g'olib chiqishini ko'rish uchun hozir tomosha qiling.
uz.p5: Biz eksklyuziv Lexus ATP Head2Head seriyasidagi eng soʻnggi oʻyin uchun maydonga qaytdik, u yerda NBA va EuroLeaguening sobiq yulduzi Ispaniyaning eng qadimgi basketbol klublaridan birida ATP Tour oʻyinchilariga qoʻshiladi. Oʻyinchilarning ushbu musobaqada tezlikni oshirayotganini tomosha qiling. Iloji boricha ko'proq ochko to'plash uchun 60 soniya. Lekin kim bosim ostida xotirjam bo'ladi va eng ko'p savatni to'playdi
uz.p6: ATP Tour o'yinchilari Gamburgda quvnoq ovga kirishayotganda hayajonga qo'shiling. Raketalardan tortib, badiiy qiyinchiliklargacha, videoni tomosha qiling va kim yakuniy g‘olib bo‘lganini bilib oling.
uz.sin: 2023 yil iyun oyida hamkorlik e'lon qilinganidan beri Lexus Buyuk Britaniyadagi ATP 500 Cinch Championships va ATP 250 Rothesay International, Germaniyadagi ATP 500 Gamburg European Open, Avstriyada ATP 250 Generali Open, ATP Open 250 kabi turli qiziqarli ATP turnirlariga homiylik qildi. Qozog'iston va boshqalar, brendning savdo maydonchalarida, shuningdek, ommaviy axborot vositalarida va onlaynda kuchli mavjudligini ta'minlaydi.
uz.sin1: 2023 yilgi mavsum oxirida Lexus Turindagi ATP 1000 Paris Rolex Masters va Nitto ATP Finals turniriga homiylik qildi. Turinda Lexus 45 ta elektrlashtirilgan modellar parkini va UX 300e gibrid va plaginli gibrid modellarni taqdim etdi.
uz.a: jumladan, yangi to‘liq elektr Lexus RZ 450e
uz.p7: Lexus vizyoni hayratlanarli tajribalar orqali haydash zavqini mukammallashtirishga asoslangan. Intuitiv, ilg'or Lexus Electrified texnologiyasidan qo'lda ishlangan, kashshof dizayngacha; biz shaxsiylashtirilgan hashamatga intilamiz.
uz.p8: Lexus hikoyasi hayratga solish ambitsiyalaridan kelib chiqqan. Dastlab, Lexus jamoasi dunyoning eng yaxshi premium avtomobil ishlab chiqaruvchilarini ortda qoldiradigan hashamatli sedan yaratishga chaqirildi. O'ttiz yil o'tdi, Lexus uchun chegara yo'q. Ilhomlantiruvchi kontsept-karlardan tortib innovatsion dizayn detallarigacha, davom etayotgan Lexus hikoyasining har bir burchagi chuqur o'ylangan. Takumining nozik qo'l san'atini yapon omotenashi madaniyati bilan uyg'unlashtirish, bu sizning ehtiyojlaringizni oldindan bilish qobiliyatini o'zida mujassam etgan; insonga qaratilgan e'tiborga erishiladi.
uz.b: BIZNING AMBITSIYONLARIMIZDAN HAYRATLANISHGA, LEXUS BILAN AJOYIB TASHRIB OLISH IMKONIYATI KELDIK.
uz.p9: Bizning muhandislik instinktlarimiz asosida va haydovchini hisobga olgan holda ishlab chiqilgan holda, intuitiv xavfsizlik, ulanish va ko'ngilochar texnologiyalarni kashf eting.
uz.p10: Qadimgi yaponiyalik Takumi sanʼatining vizual uygʻunligini va har bir Lexusning oʻziga xos, zamonaviy dizayn xususiyatlarini oʻrganing.
uz.p11: Bir marta haydashda ishonch va qulaylikni, shu bilan birga kutish va hayajonni his qilganmisiz? Lexus bilan ajoyib tajriba qilish vaqti keldi.
uz.essai: Agar siz Lexus test drayverida qatnashmoqchi bo'lsangiz, ushbu shaklni to'ldiring
uz.continuer: Sizni xabardor qilishda davom etish biz uchun muhim. Masalan, intervyularingiz yoki obuna muddati tugaganini eslatish uchun sizni eksklyuziv tadbirlarga taklif qiling yoki qiziqarli takliflardan foydalaning. Lekin biz buni to'liq shaffoflik va sizning kelishuvingiz bilan qilishni xohlaymiz.Lexusdan qanday xabarlarni olishni xohlaysiz? Bu o'zingizga bog'liq !
uz.jaimerais: Lexus menga texnik xizmat ko‘rsatish va Lexus* obunalariga obuna bo‘lish muddatlari, shuningdek, so‘nggi yangiliklar, takliflar, qiziqarli yangiliklar va voqealar, shu jumladan, Lexus’ga ko‘ra meni qiziqtirishi mumkin bo‘lgan xabarlarni yuborish uchun marketing profillarini o‘rnatish orqali menga xabar berishini istayman. tahlillar.
uz.toyota: * Ya'ni: Lexus, Toyota Belgiyaning B.U., sizning vakolatli distribyutoringiz/ta'mirlovchimiz, shuningdek, bizning boshqa korxonalarimiz (Car Security SA va Autoproduct SA, Toyota Motor Europe, Toyota Financial Services Belgiya). Belgini belgilash orqali siz Lexus siz bilan barcha kanallaringiz (manzil, telefon, elektron pochta va h.k.) orqali bog‘lanishiga rozilik bildirasiz. Bu rozilik barcha Lexus mahsulotlari va xizmatlarini qamrab oladi, jumladan, mobillik yechimlari (sug‘urta, moliyalashtirish, aksessuarlar, kengaytirilgan kafolatlar, yo‘l bo‘ylab yordam, texnik xizmat ko‘rsatish, ulangan xizmatlar va h.k.). privacy@lexus.be elektron pochta manziliga yoki Lexusga xat, mijozlarga xizmat ko'rsatish (maxfiylik), Leuvensesteenweg 369, 1932 Zaventem. Agar siz endi ma'lum bir vakolatli distribyutor/ta'mirlovchi bilan aloqaga muhtoj bo'lmasangiz, ular bilan bevosita bog'laning.
uz.enhance: Avtomobilingiz ichida ham, tashqarisida ham tajribani oshirib, biz elektrlashtirish sohasida kashshof va mukammallashayotganimizdan faxrlanamiz. Shaxsiy hashamatni o'zida mujassam etgan murosasiz ishlash va diapazon tanlovini taklif qilib, Lexus Electrified-ni kashf eting.
uz.mission: Ertangi haydash zavqini bugungi kunga olib kelish missiyasidan Lexus Electrified tug'ildi. Har bir haydovchining ehtiyojlari va afzalliklarini qondirish uchun ishlab chiqilgan bo'lib, biz 15 yildan ortiq vaqt davomida tejamkor va tejamkor elektrlashtirilgan avtomobillar qatorini yaratishga sarfladik. Texnologik yutuqlar, keyingi darajadagi xavfsizlik va hashamatli Lexus avtomobillari bilan mashhur. Elektrlashtirilgan kelajagingizga xush kelibsiz.
uz.along: Emissiyalarni kamaytirish bilan bir qatorda, bizning elektrlashtirilgan avtomobillar assortimenti transport vositalarini ishlatish xarajatlarini sezilarli darajada kamaytiradi.
uz.driver: Turmush tarzingizga mos keladigan turli xil elektrlashtirilgan avtomobillar qatoridan to'liq elektrdan tortib gibrid modellarga qadar tanlang.
uz.peace: Haydash zavqi va unumdorligiga putur etkazmasdan, kompaniya uchun tinchlik va osoyishta haydang.
uz.with: Lexus modellarining keng tanlovi, jumladan, o‘z-o‘zidan quvvatlanadigan gibrid va to‘liq elektr transport vositalari bilan kompaniya avtomobilini tanlash yoki xarajatlarni kamaytirish, chiqindilarni kamaytirish va parkingizni o‘zgartirish hech qachon oson bo‘lmagan.
uz.helpful: Bu sahifa siz izlayotgan narsani topishda qanchalik foydali?
uz.find1: Lexus avtomobillari egalari uchun xizmat ko'rsatish muddati davomida taqdim etiladigan xizmatlarning sohada etakchi hisoblanishining sababini bilib oling.
uz.everything: HAYDASH UCHUN SIZGA KERAK BO'LADIGAN HAMMASI
uz.discover1: Yoshingiz yoki yurgan masofangizdan qat'i nazar, Lexus avtomobilingizga g'amxo'rlik qilish uchun maxsus xizmatlarni kashf eting.
uz.wemake: Biz Lexus avtomobiliga egalik qilishni shaxsiylashtiramiz, avtomobilingizni saqlashga va har bir sayohatdan zavqlanishga yordam beradigan onlayn xizmatlar qatorini taqdim etamiz.
uz.service: Xizmat eslatmalari: Avtomobilingizga xizmat ko'rsatish muddati kelganida, Mening Lexusim sizni xabardor qiladi, shunda avtomobilingizni har doim yaxshi holatda saqlashingiz mumkin.
uz.ownersmanuals: Egalarning qo'llanmalari: Avtomobilingizdan maksimal darajada foydalanish uchun kerakli barcha batafsil ma'lumotlarga tezkor kirish imkoniyatiga ega bo'ling.
uz.journey: Sayohat rejalashtiruvchisi: Keyingi safaringizni osonlik bilan xaritaga soling va tafsilotlarni Lexus navigatsiya tizimingizga yuboring, qayerda bo'lmasangiz ham.

en.lex1: In 2023, Lexus signed a multi-year partnership with the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) as Official Automotive Partner and Platinum Partner of the ATP Tour. Lexus and the ATP Tour both tell a story of innovation, performance and pursuit of perfection. Fans and customers always come first, and both brands operate with a focus on providing unforgettable experiences.
en.dive: Dive into an electrifying series that takes player challenges to a whole new level. Catch every moment with all episodes coming to YouTube.
en.p1: In the sixth episode of Lexus ATP Head2Head series ATP Tour players swap rackets for wickets. In London they try their hand at that most British of sports - cricket. Two England cricket professionals put them through their paces at the crease, testing their batting and fielding accuracy. Who will score the most runs? Watch to find out.
en.p2: In the second episode watch as the ATP Tour players head to Paris to compete in the latest electrifying scavenger hunt. Their mission: locate as many items as possible within a tight 40-minute window. Watch the video to discover who claims the title of champion.
en.p3: Watch the showdown in Turin as ATP Tour players face off in the third installment of the Head2Head Scavenger Hunt. With the loser facing a forfeit, the pressure is well and truly on. Tune in to the video to witness who rises to the top.
en.p4: The fourth episode of the Lexus ATP Head2Head Exclusive Series sees our ATP Tour players face off in a cooking challenge. In this first episode of 2024, they head to Restaurant Fred in Rotterdam to meet a two Michelin starred chef, cooking a meal from scratch with a basket of mystery ingredients. Watch now to see who will win the Lexus Cook Off Challenge.
en.p5: We are back on the courts for the latest in the exclusive Lexus ATP Head2Head series, where former star of the NBA and EuroLeague joins ATP Tour players at one of Spain's oldest basketball clubs. Watch the players really picking up the pace in this challenge, with just 60 seconds to score as many points as they can. But who will remain calm under pressure and make the most baskets?
en.p6: Join the excitement as ATP Tour players embark on an electrifying scavenger hunt in Hamburg. From gripping racquets to artistic challenges, watch the video and discover who became the ultimate winner.
en.sin: Since the partnership announcement in June 2023, Lexus has sponsored various exhilarating ATP Tournaments such as ATP 500 Cinch Championships and ATP 250 Rothesay International in Great Britain, ATP 500 Hamburg European Open in Germany, ATP 250 Generali Open in Austria, ATP 250 Astana Open in Kazakhstan, and others, providing strong brand presence at the venues as well as in media and online.
en.sin1: At the end of the 2023 season, Lexus sponsored the ATP 1000 Paris Rolex Masters and the Nitto ATP Finals in Turin in a thrilling climax of the tournament. In Turin, Lexus provided a fleet of 45 electrified models, and UX 300e together with hybrid and plug-in hybrid models.
en.a: including the new all-electric Lexus RZ 450e
en.p7: The Lexus vision is built on perfecting driving pleasure through amazing experiences. From intuitive, cutting-edge Lexus Electrified technology to hand-crafted, pioneering design; we strive for personalised luxury.
en.p8: The Lexus story is born from the ambition to amaze. In the beginning, a Lexus team was challenged to create a luxury sedan to surpass the world’s best premium carmakers. Thirty years on, there’s no limit to Lexus. From inspiring concept cars to innovative design details, every corner of the ongoing Lexus story is peppered with thoughtful consideration. Combining the delicate handcraft of Takumi with the Japanese culture of omotenashi, which embodies the ability to anticipate your needs; a human-centred focus is achieved.
en.b: FROM OUR AMBITION TO AMAZE, CAME THE POSSIBILITY TO EXPERIENCE AMAZING WITH LEXUS.
en.first: BE THE FIRST TO HEAR LBX NEWS
en.p9: Guided by our engineering instincts and designed with the driver in mind, discover intuitive safety, connectivity, and entertainment technology.
en.p10: Explore the visual harmony of the ancient Japanese art of Takumi and the distinguished, contemporary design features of every Lexus.
en.p11: Have you ever felt driving assurance and comfort, yet anticipation and exhilaration in one drive? It’s time to Experience Amazing with Lexus.
en.relevant: Please select the relevant country to
en.essai: Remplissez ce formulaire si vous souhaitez participer à un essai Lexus
en.continuer: Continuer à vous informer, c’est important pour nous Par exemple, pour vous rappeler vos entretiens ou l’expiration d’un abonnement, vous inviter à des événements exclusifs ou vous faire profiter d’offres intéressantes. Mais nous souhaitons le faire en toute transparence et avec votre accord.Quelles communications souhaitez-vous recevoir de la part de Lexus ? C’est vous qui décidez !
en.jaimerais: J’aimerais que Lexus m’informe sur les échéances de mes entretiens et abonnements chez Lexus* ainsi que sur les dernières nouveautés, offres, infos intéressantes et événements, y compris en établissant des profils marketing permettant de m’envoyer les communications les plus susceptibles de m’intéresser selon les analyses de Lexus.
en.toyota: * C’est-à-dire : Lexus, B.U. de Toyota Belgium, votre distributeur/réparateur agréé ainsi que nos autres entités (Car Security SA et Autoproduct SA, Toyota Motor Europe, Toyota Financial Services Belgium). En cochant la case, vous acceptez que Lexus vous contacte via tous vos canaux (adresse, téléphone, e-mail…). Ce consentement couvre tous les produits et services de Lexus y compris les solutions de mobilité (assurance, financement, accessoires, garanties prolongées, assistance routière, entretiens, services connectés…).. Ce consentement n’est pas obligatoire et vous pouvez y mettre fin à tout moment en nous envoyant un e-mail à privacy@lexus.be ou un courrier à Lexus, service clientèle (privacy), Leuvensesteenweg 369, 1932 Zaventem. Si vous ne souhaitez plus de communication de la part d’un distributeur/réparateur agréé spécifique, merci de prendre contact directement avec lui.
en.enhance: Enhancing experiences both in and out of your vehicle, we’re proud to be pioneering and perfecting in electrification. Offering uncompromised performance and range choice that embodies personal luxury, discover Lexus Electrified.
en.mission: From a mission to bring tomorrow’s driving pleasure into today, Lexus Electrified was born. Designed to meet every driver’s needs and preferences, we’ve spent over 15 years creating an electrified car range that is cost and energy efficient, accessible and dynamic. All the while possessing the signature technological advances, next level safety, and luxury craft Lexus vehicles are known for. Welcome to your electrified future.
en.along: Alongside reducing emissions, our electrified car range also significantly cuts vehicle running costs.
en.driver: Choose from a diverse range of electrified cars to suit your lifestyle, from all-electric to hybrid models.
en.peace: Drive with peace and quiet for company, without compromising on driving pleasure and performance.
en.with: With a wide choice of Lexus models, including self-charging hybrid and all-electric vehicles, it has never been easier to choose your company car or reduce costs, minimise emissions and transform your fleet.
en.helpful: How helpful is this page to find what you are looking for?
en.how: How can we improve this page?
en.find1: Find out why the service Lexus offers its car owners through the vehicle’s life is considered industry-leading.
en.discover1: Discover the tailored services designed to take care of your Lexus no matter its age or mileage.
en.wemake: We make owning a Lexus personal with a range of online of online services to help you maintain your car and enjoy every journey.
en.service: Service reminders: When your car is due a service My Lexus will notify you, so you can always stay on top of your car maintenance.
en.ownersmanuals: Owner's manuals: Enjoy immediate access to all the detailed information you need to get the most out of your car.
en.journey: Journey planner: Easily map your next trip and send the details to your Lexus navigation system, wherever you are.
